token.name: Token
token.description: Providing your own GitHub token will ensure Nickel is always able to perform update checks for mods hosted on GitHub.

message.missingToken: GitHub token is not provided in mod settings. It is <c=cheevoGold>recommended</c> for Nickel to be able to perform update checks for mods hosted on GitHub.
message.unauthorized: There was a problem authorizing with GitHub - is your provided token expired or revoked? Update it in mod settings.
